name: yt-link
description: Desktop app to download youtube videos and playlist as mp3 files
author: Steven Ou

scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run prepare:bins && concurrently "npm:dev-frontend" "npm:dev-electron"
scripts.prepare:bins: chmod +x bin/ffmpeg bin/yt-dlp || echo 'Could not set permissions on binaries'
scripts.dev-frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:backend: cd service && pip install -r requirements.txt && python -m PyInstaller app.py --noconfirm --onefile --name yt-link-backend --distpath ./dist
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run dist
